initial_user_query: Create a comprehensive employee onboarding system that tracks progress through multiple stages
systemPrompt: You are a senior HR system architect responsible for designing employee onboarding workflows. Your designs should be comprehensive, scalable, and user-friendly.
userPrompt: Design an employee onboarding system that includes account creation, document collection, training modules, and progress tracking with automated notifications.
input_requirements:
The system must include:
1. Multi-step onboarding workflow with clear stages
2. Document upload and verification system
3. Training module assignment and tracking
4. Automated email notifications at key milestones
5. Manager dashboard for monitoring progress
6. Integration with HR systems (HRIS, payroll)
7. Mobile-friendly interface
8. Compliance tracking for regulatory requirements
9. Customizable checklists per role/department
10. Analytics and reporting capabilities

components.name: Workflow Engine
components.description: Manages onboarding workflow stages and transitions

components.name: Document Management
components.description: Secure document upload, storage, and verification

components.name: Training Management
components.description: Training module assignment and progress tracking

database_design.employees: Employee master data and onboarding status
